snippet.title: Match report: Fyfe leads Freo to down Suns
snippet.content:
Hayden Ballantyne didn't get a lot of touches but he's never quiet
FREMANTLE has run away from a competitive Gold Coast in the late stages of Saturday nights clash at Domain Stadium, winning 12.18 (90) to 10.7 (67) after leading by just nine points late in the third quarter.
Despite being out of the finals race the Dockers and Suns put on an entertaining contest, and Fremantle in particular looks like presenting problems for higher ranked teams on the run to September. Gold Coast's twin towers Peter Wright and Tom Lynch stood up with three goals each, while Cam McCarthy slotted four - his best return since crossing to Freo at the end of last season. More to come FREMANTLE 3.5 7.8 11.12 12.18 (90) GOLD COAST 4.0 5.4 8.7 10.7 (67)
